channel.title: 2 .bat file makers
channel.description:
hi moparscape ive made 2 .bat files which make....
custom items interface maker
ok
custom item maker
[code] @ECHO OFF TITLE Model Maker V.1 by rockhard color 0c :maker cls
ECHO. ECHO Welcome to Model Maker V.1 ECHO 1.) What Model Type are you making? ECHO Types: mask, phat, helm, plate body, plate legs ECHO. SET /P ModelType=Model Type?
if %ModelType%==mask GOTO mask if %ModelType%==phat GOTO phat if %ModelType%==helm GOTO helm if %ModelType%==plate body GOTO body if %ModelType%==plate legs GOTO legs
:mask cls ECHO. ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621) ECHO. SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: ECHO. ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear) ECHO. SET /P Option=Item Option: ECHO. ECHO 4.)Item Color ECHO. SET /P Color=Item Color: ECHO. ECHO 5.) Item Name ECHO. SET /P Name=Item Name: ECHO. ECHO 6.) Description ECHO. SET /P Describe=Description: ECHO.
ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~ ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%"; ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; ECHO //Purple: 926-127 ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%; ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look ECHO class8.anInt181 = 900; ECHO class8.anInt190 = 400; ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850; ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1; ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1; ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3188; ECHO class8.anInt200 = 255; ECHO class8.anInt175 = 255; ECHO class8.anInt197 = 100; ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%"; ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes(); ECHO }
SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)? If %New%==y GOTO maker If %New%==n GOTO bye
:phat cls ECHO. ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621) ECHO. SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: ECHO. ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear) ECHO. SET /P Option=Item Option: ECHO. ECHO 4.)Item Color ECHO. SET /P Color=Item Color: ECHO. ECHO 5.) Item Name ECHO. SET /P Name=Item Name: ECHO. ECHO 6.) Description ECHO. SET /P Describe=Description: ECHO.
ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~ ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%"; ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; ECHO //Purple: 926-127 ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%; ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2635;//Item Look ECHO class8.anInt181 = 440; ECHO class8.anInt190 = 76; ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850; ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1; ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1; ECHO class8.anInt165 = 187; ECHO class8.anInt200 = 363; ECHO class8.anInt175 = 29; ECHO class8.anInt197 = 87; ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%"; ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes(); ECHO }
SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)? If %New%==y GOTO maker If %New%==n GOTO bye
:helm cls ECHO. ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621) ECHO. SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: ECHO. ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear) ECHO. SET /P Option=Item Option: ECHO. ECHO 4.)Item Color ECHO. SET /P Color=Item Color: ECHO. ECHO 5.) Item Name ECHO. SET /P Name=Item Name: ECHO. ECHO 6.) Description ECHO. SET /P Describe=Description: ECHO.
ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~ ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%"; ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; ECHO //Purple: 926-127 ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%; ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2813;//Item Look ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800; ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160; ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152; ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3; ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5; ECHO class8.anInt165 = 218; ECHO class8.anInt200 = 395; ECHO class8.anInt175 = 57; ECHO class8.anInt197 = 117; ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%"; ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes(); ECHO }
SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)? If %New%==y GOTO maker If %New%==n GOTO bye
:body cls ECHO. ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621) ECHO. SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: ECHO. ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear) ECHO. SET /P Option=Item Option: ECHO. ECHO 4.)Item Color ECHO. SET /P Color=Item Color: ECHO. ECHO 5.) Item Name ECHO. SET /P Name=Item Name: ECHO. ECHO 6.) Description ECHO. SET /P Describe=Description: ECHO.
ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~ ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%"; ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; ECHO //Purple: 926-127 ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%; ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2378;//Item Look ECHO class8.anInt181 = 1180; ECHO class8.anInt190 = 452; ECHO class8.anInt198 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt169 = -1; ECHO class8.anInt194 = -1; ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3379; ECHO class8.anInt200 = 3383; ECHO class8.anInt175 = -1; ECHO class8.anInt197 = -1; ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%"; ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes(); ECHO }
SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)? If %New%==y GOTO maker If %New%==n GOTO bye
:legs cls ECHO. ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621) ECHO. SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: ECHO. ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear) ECHO. SET /P Option=Item Option: ECHO. ECHO 4.)Item Color ECHO. SET /P Color=Item Color: ECHO. ECHO 5.) Item Name ECHO. SET /P Name=Item Name: ECHO. ECHO 6.) Description ECHO. SET /P Describe=Description: ECHO.
ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){ //~%Name%~ ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%"; ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; ECHO //Purple: 926-127 ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%; ECHO class8.anInt174 = 5026;//Item Look ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800; ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160; ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152; ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0; ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3; ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5; ECHO class8.anInt165 = 5024; ECHO class8.anInt200 = 5024; ECHO class8.anInt175 = 5024; ECHO class8.anInt197 = 5024; ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%"; ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes(); ECHO }
SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)? If %New%==y GOTO maker If %New%==n GOTO bye
:bye cls ECHO. ECHO _______________________________________________ ECHO | Thanks for using Model Maker!!!!!!! | ECHO ----------------------------------------------- ECHO.
 [/code]
interface maker
[code] @echo off TITLE interface maker by rockhard echo license agreement: echo just type y lol echo . echo do you agree? y/n set /p setoption=Option: if %setoption%==y goto menu if %setoption%==n goto close pause :menu echo to add a spellclick type: spellclick echo to make the void that gives the name to spells and images type : tab set /p setoption=Option: if %setoption%==spellclick goto spellclick if %setoption%==Spellclick goto spellclick if %setoption%==SPELLCLICK goto spellclick if %setoption%==tab goto TABVOID if %setoption%==Tab goto TABVOID if %setoption%==TAB goto TABVOID
:TABVOID echo set the file name set /p FILE=: cls echo set the name of your void set /p VOIDNAME=: cls echo whats the id of the tab you are gonna draw on? (if not overwritting an old one make it a number above 19000) set /p TABID=: cls echo oke what will the spellID be? set /p ID=: cls echo whats the SPellon ID? set /p ONID=: cls echo and the off? set /p OFFID=: cls echo oke now make a nice spellname (atm add cast before the name= like cast veagence)//note : colours coming soon set /p SPELLNAME=: cls echo what is the spelltype? (if you dont know make it 5_ set /p TYPE=: cls echo action type? if you dont know keep it 1 set /p ACTIONTYPE=: cls echo whats the usableon digit? set /p USABLE=: cls echo enter the X coord of where u want to draw the spell set /p X=: cls echo enter the y coord now set /p Y=: cls echo //this code was made with interface creator beta >> ./%FILE%.txt echo //by Rockhard >> ./%FILE%.txt echo //cheers >> ./%FILE%.txt echo public static void %VOIDNAME%() >> ./%FILE%.txt echo { >> ./%FILE%.txt echo RSInterface Tab = addTab(%TABID%); >> ./%FILE%.txt echo addSpellClick(%ID%, %ONID%, %OFFID%, "%SPELLNAME%", %TYPE%, %ACTIONTYPE%, %USABLE%, null); >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.scrollMax = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.aBoolean266 = false; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.children = new int[1]; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.childX = new int[1]; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.childY = new int[1]; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.children[0] = %ID%; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.childX[0] = %X%; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo Tab.childY[0] = %Y%; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo } >> ./%FILE%.txt pause cls goto :menu :spellclick echo set the file name (NO EXTENSION NEEDED TO WRITE SO DONT MAKE FILENAME AA.TXT) set /p FILE=: cls echo please type the number of your spellclick void echo for example you made one. the next one will be number 2 set /p NUMBER=: cls echo enter the width of the area you can click (default for spells = 20) set /p SPELLCLICKWIDTH=: cls echo enter the height of the area you can click (default for spells = 20) set /p SPELLCLICKHEIGHT=: cls echo enter the defautlt filename you are gonna use. (like if you use lunar you make it lunaron) later on when you set the onid 10 in the void for the spell it means that the sprite for that spell must be : lunaron 10.png set /p SPRITENAMEON=: cls echo same as spriteon but than it would be lunaroff 10.png set /p SPRITENAMEOFF=: cls echo public static void addSpellClick%NUMBER%(int id, int spriteOnId, int spriteOffId, String castText, int type, int ActionType, int Usableon, String actname) >> ./%FILE%.txt echo { >> ./%FILE%.txt echo RSInterface spell = interfaceCache[id] = new RSInterface(); >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.id = id; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.parentID = id; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.type = type; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.atActionType = ActionType; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.spellName = castText; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.anInt214 = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.width = %SPELLCLICKWIDTH%; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.height = %SPELLCLICKHEIGHT%; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.aByte254 = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.anInt230 = 5; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.spellUsableOn = Usableon; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.selectedActionName = actname; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.sprite1 = newSprites(spriteOnId, "%SPRITENAMEON%"); >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.sprite2 = newSprites(spriteOffId, "%SPRITENAMEOFF%"); >> ./%FILE%.txt echo spell.tooltip = castText; >> ./%FILE%.txt echo } >> ./%FILE%.txt pause goto menu :close close [/code]
[code=apache]Remember Open notepad paste it there and save as .bat![/code]

item.title: 2 .bat file makers
item.dc:creator: @rockh4rd rockh4rd
item.description:
@rockh4rd wrote:

hi moparscape ive made 2 .bat files which make…

custom items
interface maker

ok

custom item maker

@ECHO OFF
TITLE Model Maker V.1 by rockhard
color 0c
:maker
cls


ECHO.
ECHO Welcome to Model Maker V.1
ECHO 1.) What Model Type are you making?
ECHO Types: mask, phat, helm, plate body, plate legs
ECHO.
SET /P ModelType=Model Type? 


if %ModelType%==mask GOTO mask
if %ModelType%==phat GOTO phat
if %ModelType%==helm GOTO helm
if %ModelType%==plate body GOTO body
if %ModelType%==plate legs GOTO legs















:mask
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: 
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option: 
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color: 
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name: 
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description: 
ECHO.




ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){  //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%";
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;        
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2438;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 900;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 400;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3188;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 255;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 255;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 100;
ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%";
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes();
ECHO }



SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye




:phat
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: 
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option: 
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color: 
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name: 
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description: 
ECHO.


ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){  //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%";
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;        
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2635;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 440;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 76;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 1850;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = 1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 187;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 363;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 29;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 87;
ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%";
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes();
ECHO }







SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye










:helm
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: 
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option: 
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color: 
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name: 
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description: 
ECHO.



ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){  //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%";
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;        
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2813;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 218;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 395;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 57;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 117;
ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%";
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes();
ECHO }



SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye







:body
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: 
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option: 
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color: 
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name: 
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description: 
ECHO.



ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){  //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%";
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;        
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 2378;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 1180;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 452;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 3379;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 3383;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = -1;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = -1;
ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%";
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes();
ECHO }





SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye







:legs
cls
ECHO.
ECHO 2.)Item Number (eg: 7621)
ECHO.
SET /P Itemnumber=New Item ID: 
ECHO.
ECHO 3.)Item Option (eg: Wear)
ECHO.
SET /P Option=Item Option: 
ECHO.
ECHO 4.)Item Color
ECHO.
SET /P Color=Item Color: 
ECHO.
ECHO 5.) Item Name
ECHO.
SET /P Name=Item Name: 
ECHO.
ECHO 6.) Description
ECHO.
SET /P Describe=Description: 
ECHO.






ECHO if(i == %Itemnumber%){  //~%Name%~
ECHO class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
ECHO class8.aStringArray189[1] = "%option%";
ECHO class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
ECHO class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1];
ECHO //Purple: 926-127
ECHO class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926;
ECHO class8.anIntArray160[0] = %Color%;        
ECHO class8.anInt174 = 5026;//Item Look
ECHO class8.anInt181 = 800;
ECHO class8.anInt190 = 160;
ECHO class8.anInt198 = 152;
ECHO class8.anInt204 = 0;
ECHO class8.anInt169 = 3;
ECHO class8.anInt194 = -5;
ECHO class8.anInt165 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt200 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt175 = 5024;
ECHO class8.anInt197 = 5024;
ECHO class8.aString170 = "%Name%";
ECHO class8.aByteArray178 = "%describe%".getBytes();
ECHO }



SET /P New=Do You Want To Make Another Item (y/n)?
If %New%==y GOTO maker
If %New%==n GOTO bye




:bye
cls
ECHO.
ECHO           _______________________________________________
ECHO          | Thanks for using Model Maker!!!!!!! |
ECHO           -----------------------------------------------
ECHO.

interface maker

@echo off
TITLE interface maker by rockhard
echo license agreement:
echo just type y lol
echo .
echo do you agree? y/n
set /p setoption=Option:
if %setoption%==y goto menu
if %setoption%==n goto close
pause
:menu
echo to add a spellclick type: spellclick
echo to make the void that gives the name to spells and images type : tab
set /p setoption=Option: 
if %setoption%==spellclick goto spellclick
if %setoption%==Spellclick goto spellclick
if %setoption%==SPELLCLICK goto spellclick
if %setoption%==tab goto TABVOID
if %setoption%==Tab goto TABVOID
if %setoption%==TAB goto TABVOID
 
:TABVOID
echo set the file name
set /p FILE=:
cls
echo set the name of your void
set /p VOIDNAME=:
cls
echo whats the id of the tab you are gonna draw on? (if not overwritting an old one make it a number above 19000)
set /p TABID=:
cls
echo oke what will the spellID be?
set /p ID=:
cls
echo whats the SPellon ID?
set /p ONID=:
cls
echo and the off?
set /p OFFID=:
cls
echo oke now make a nice spellname (atm add cast before the name= like cast veagence)//note : colours coming soon
set /p SPELLNAME=:
cls
echo what is the spelltype? (if you dont know make it 5_
set /p TYPE=:
cls
echo action type? if you dont know keep it 1
set /p ACTIONTYPE=:
cls
echo whats the usableon digit?
set /p USABLE=:
cls
echo enter the X coord of where u want to draw the spell
set /p X=:
cls
echo enter the y coord now
set /p Y=:
cls
echo //this code was made with interface creator beta >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo //by Rockhard  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo //cheers  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo public static void %VOIDNAME%() >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo { >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo RSInterface Tab = addTab(%TABID%); >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo addSpellClick(%ID%, %ONID%, %OFFID%, "%SPELLNAME%", %TYPE%, %ACTIONTYPE%, %USABLE%, null); >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        Tab.scrollMax = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo       Tab.aBoolean266 = false; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo     Tab.children = new int[1];  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo       Tab.childX = new int[1];  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo       Tab.childY = new int[1];  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo               Tab.children[0] = %ID%;  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo                 Tab.childX[0] = %X%;  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo                 Tab.childY[0] = %Y%;  >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo } >> ./%FILE%.txt
pause
cls
goto :menu
:spellclick
echo set the file name (NO EXTENSION NEEDED TO WRITE SO DONT MAKE FILENAME AA.TXT)
set /p FILE=:
cls
echo please type the number of your spellclick void
echo for example you made one. the next one will be number 2
set /p NUMBER=:
cls
echo enter the width of the area you can click (default for spells = 20)
set /p SPELLCLICKWIDTH=:
cls
echo enter the height of the area you can click (default for spells = 20)
set /p SPELLCLICKHEIGHT=:
cls
echo enter the defautlt filename you are gonna use. (like if you use lunar you make it lunaron) later on when you set the onid 10 in the void for the spell it means that the sprite for that spell must be : lunaron 10.png
set /p SPRITENAMEON=:
cls
echo same as spriteon but than it would be lunaroff 10.png
set /p SPRITENAMEOFF=:
cls
echo public static void addSpellClick%NUMBER%(int id, int spriteOnId, int spriteOffId, String castText, int type, int ActionType, int Usableon, String actname) >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo    { >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        RSInterface spell = interfaceCache[id] = new RSInterface(); >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.id = id; >> ./%FILE%.txt
 echo       spell.parentID = id; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.type = type; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.atActionType = ActionType; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo    spell.spellName = castText; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.anInt214 = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.width = %SPELLCLICKWIDTH%; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.height = %SPELLCLICKHEIGHT%; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.aByte254 = 0; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo        spell.anInt230 = 5; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo    spell.spellUsableOn = Usableon; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo    spell.selectedActionName = actname; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo spell.sprite1 = newSprites(spriteOnId, "%SPRITENAMEON%"); >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo           spell.sprite2 = newSprites(spriteOffId, "%SPRITENAMEOFF%"); >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo           spell.tooltip = castText; >> ./%FILE%.txt
echo    } >> ./%FILE%.txt
pause
goto menu
:close
close
Remember Open notepad paste it there and save as .bat!
